title: From AI to steel, blue is the new green for power-hungry industry
description: Three Mile Island nuclear power station in Pennsylvania is reopening to supply electricity to Microsoft's data centers. Tech giants like Microsoft, Amazon, and Google are increasingly turning to nuclear power to meet the rising energy demands of artificial intelligence. Small modular reactors are being explored as a future energy solution globally, including in India.
